sentences.en: Actually, those may not be such a dichotomy.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 两派或许根本没那么水火不容.

sentences.en: But even Laila Ali admits that she is a walking dichotomy.
sentences.cn: 但即使是莱拉·阿里也承认,自己的性格具有鲜明的两面性.

sentences.en: But perhaps instead it is time to ask whether the dichotomy between banks and markets false.
sentences.cn: 不过,与之相反,现在或许正是我们反思银行和市场两分法是否正确的时机.

sentences.en: Can the Zeta's explain the hemisperical crustal dichotomy of the planet Mars?
sentences.cn: 齐塔人能否解释下火星半球地壳两分的(原理) 吗 ?

sentences.en: Coherence enjoys in nature the dichotomy between explicitness and implicitness , stability and dynamics, and and macrocosm.
sentences.cn: 连贯呈现出显性与隐性、静态性与动态性 、 微观性与宏观性的二元性特征.

sentences.en: For those of you familiar with cognitive psychology this will a familiar dichotomy.
sentences.cn: 那些对认知心理学比较熟悉的读者会发现这其实是个熟悉的两分法.

sentences.en: If this dichotomy is maintained what happens to the rate of interest?
sentences.cn: 如果保持这种二分法,利率会怎样 呢 ?

sentences.en: Specific analytical methods have linear regression analysis method and logic dichotomy.
sentences.cn: 具体分析方法有线性回归、二分法和逻辑分析方法.

sentences.en: Such a dichotomy cannot simply be attributed to coincidence.
sentences.cn: 这样一种分歧不能简单归之于巧合.

sentences.en: The dichotomy between peace and war.
sentences.cn: 和平与战争之一分为二.

sentences.en: The dichotomy of discovery and establishment of law also has certain foundations in hermeneutic.
sentences.cn: 法的发现与证立之二分同时存在解释学上的依据.

sentences.en: The dynamic state dichotomy vectorization insures precision of drawings but has redundant data.
sentences.cn: 动态二分矢量化方法可以确保图形的点位精度,但存在大量冗余数据.

sentences.en: There is a dichotomy between the academic world and the industrial world.
sentences.cn: 学术界与工业界有着天壤之别。

sentences.en: There is a natural dichotomy between the two sides of one’s personality that is usually displayed between the different types of social groups with which an individual may identify oneself.
sentences.cn: 在一个人性格的这两方面之间，存在着一种自然的两分法。 个人的性格一般就体现在这一个人所可能认同的不同社会群体之间。

sentences.en: There is an odd dichotomy of comfort andin the combination of furniture and objects of weaponry.
sentences.cn: 将家具和武器相结合到一起,舒适性其实也不那么重要了.

sentences.en: They set up a false dichotomy between work and raising a family.
sentences.cn: 他们错误地把工作与养育儿女两者对立起来.

sentences.en: This dichotomy has its uses, but it can cause problems if taken too literally.
sentences.cn: 这种二分法有它的用途，但如果死板地应用也会引发一些问题。

sentences.en: What is needed is a less rigid dichotomy between the autonomy of nurses and doctors, and more collaborative teamwork.
sentences.cn: 需要减少护士和医生之间僵化的二分法，并进行更多团队合作。

words.tran_cn: 叉状分枝的；分成两个的
[生物]二分法；两分；分裂；[植]双歧分枝
